Texts.Chs: 啊，死亡。它一直都是一个解决问题的好方法，对吧？谢谢，认真。作为我对你的感激，来，拿着这个香蕉。
Texts.Eng: Ah, death. Always a good way to solve a problem, right? Thanks. Seriously. As a token of my gratitude, have this banana.

Texts.Chs: 我不经意间惹怒了一个名为维列斯的太空海盗。我现在已经了解到，他想要我的命。你能利用你的外交手段来解决我的这个麻烦吗？
Texts.Eng: I have inadvertently angered a space pirate named Wrex. Charming, I know. He wants my head, all over a spilled milkshake. Could you perhaps try your brand of diplomacy to solve my issue?

Texts.Chs: 在^orange;科学前哨站^reset;回复^orange;白痴^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Return to the ^orange;idiot^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 和 ^orange;白痴^reset;聊聊，然后去找^orange;泰特纳斯.维列斯^reset;
Texts.Eng: Talk to the ^orange;idiot^reset; to go to ^orange;Titanus Wrex^reset;
